text: In azoʙ az on saʙaʙ ʙud, ki pajomʙaronason ʙo dalelhoi ravsan nazdason omadand, vale pajomʙaronasro inkor kardand va Alloh ham ononro ʙa azoʙas furu girift. Va haroina, Alloh nerumand ast, kase Uro maƣluʙ natavonad kard va saxtuquʙat ast ʙa kasone, ki ʙa U imon naovardand va nofarmonʙardori kardaand
